name: Blow It Up (itch) (JohnMannP)
description:
This is a fan game for the twitch streamer Mizkif.  It's made in Unreal Engine 4.27. 

The game is a 3D Platformer and is about 1 hour long (Could be way shorter or longer depending on your skill). Optionally you can pick up checkpoints to teleport to them when ever you want. You can also pick up stars that are usually hidden / hard to get. 

The game has 2 endings depending on if you collected all of the stars or not.

Unfortunately the game doesnt have any saving mechanics so ragequitting the game will make you replay it from the start again. Game settings should be saved.

If you have any problems with Settings -  CLICK APPLY SETTINGS AND THEN PRESS BACK AND OPEN SETTINGS AGAIN

I hope you enjoy the game and thanks for playing! <3

- John
